content: The following is a list of [massacres](/wiki/Massacre) that have occurred in [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore) (numbers may be approximate): NameDateLocationDeathsPerpetrator(s)Notes[1915 Singapore Mutiny](/wiki/1915_Singapore_Mutiny)February 15, 1915Singapore36[British Indian Army's](/wiki/British_Indian_Army) [5th Light Infantry](/wiki/5th_Light_Infantry)[Sook Ching massacre](/wiki/Sook_Ching_massacre)February 18 – March 2, 1942[Singapore](/wiki/Singapore)40,000–50,000Imperial Japanese Army, Military Police Corps[Selarang Barracks Incident](/wiki/Selarang_Barracks_Incident)August 30 - September 5, 1942[Singapore](/wiki/Singapore)≥4[Indian National Army](/wiki/Indian_National_Army)[Double Tenth incident](/wiki/Double_Tenth_incident)October 10, 1943[Singapore](/wiki/Singapore)57Imperial Japanese Army, Military Police Corps[Geylang Bahru family murders](/wiki/Geylang_Bahru_family_murders)January 6, 1979Block 58, [Geylang Bahru](/wiki/Geylang_Bahru)4Unknown[Ang Mo Kio family murders](/wiki/Ang_Mo_Kio_family_murders)March 28, 1983[Ang Mo Kio](/wiki/Ang_Mo_Kio), Singapore3Lim Beng Hai and Michael Tan Teow
title: List of massacres in Singapore
